chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having the following problem:
When I was about to charge my phone, I noticed it's not charging. And no matter how I try to change the plug, the problem comes from the cable; apparently it's no longer functional.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We hope you are well. We inform you that the charger for iPhone 12 64 GB - Blue ordered by your customer Severine is defective.

Please ship a replacement accessory within 48 hours and send us the tracking number please. 

If you do not have the item in stock or cannot ship it within 48 hours, we will offer them a £15 goodwill gesture at your expense, as outlined in our Quality Charter. 

We look forward to hearing from you.

Eliot, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are very sorry to hear that the customer is encountering such a problem with the cable. We are willing to offer a commercial gesture of 30 euros for this inconvenience with respect to the Quality Charter. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello,

Thank you for your care

The customer accepts the proposal of 30 euro 

We will wait for your confirmation 
Best regards,
Eliot,
Back Marke Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the commercial gesture.

Regards,
JH
